message: Starting lifecycle flow investigation - tracing task creation, agent deployment, and status transitions
Tracing task creation flow - found create_real_task at line 222, examining initial status setup
Found critical lifecycle issue - Task status never transitions from INITIALIZED to ACTIVE, examining agent count flows
Confirmed stale data: GLOBAL_REGISTRY.json shows active_tasks:44, active_agents:102 - these counts are NEVER decremented properly

Successfully traced complete lifecycle flow and documented root causes. Found: 1) Task status never transitions from INITIALIZED, 2) Global registry counts only increment, 3) Dashboard reads stale JSON instead of SQLite, 4) Frontend uses wrong logic for active tasks. Created comprehensive analysis document with fix design.
